name: claude-client-deploy
description: Client-specific Claude Desktop + Code deployment with orchestrator and MCPs

comments.optionalDependencies: Customize which MCPs to include per client. Remove unused MCPs to reduce installation size.
comments.instructions: 1. Edit optionalDependencies to include only needed MCPs. 2. Update config/mcpConfig.json to match. 3. Run 'npm install:all' to deploy.
